title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 121: Featuring Kelly Chase
description:
On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by former St. Louis Blues forward Kelly Chase. The guys talk about Kelly's career, playing with Brett Hull, St. Louis hockey and a ton more. The guys also have a Halloween themed episode and talk a ton about former costumes, NHL Halloween parties and a lot more. Plus a Halloween themed All Right Hamilton to end the episode.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
